SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities

Interface Newtonian

All Superinterfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, BufferedMovable, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, DirectionProvider, GameNode, MotionModifier, Movable, NewtonianModifier, Placeable, SpeedProvider
public interface Newtonian extends BufferedMovable, NewtonianModifier
A Newtonian is a special case of a Movable that abides the basic laws of gravity and friction. It should be used for Dynamic Entities that should also display some physics behaviour. This physics is rather elemental and should not be compared for fully fledged physics.

    • addSimplePhysics

      default Updatable addSimplePhysics()
      Return an Updatable that applies simple rules of physics on each call to Updatable.update(long).

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

      Returns:
      an instance of Updatable
